links.title: Netflix (NFLX) Q2 Subscriber Figures Were Alarmingly Low
links.description: Netflix ( NFLX - Free Report) saw its stock price climb over 1% during regular trading hours Monday in a sign that investors were expecting strong Q2 results from the streaming TV giant. But shares of NFLX plummeted after Netflix failed to meet its own subscriber growth estimates by a wide margin in an announcement that is truly worrisome.

links.title: Apple's App Store doubles Google Play revenue with only half the downloads, study finds
links.description: App analytics firm Sensor Tower is out with their latest report, once more showing Apple's App Store trouncing the more widely used Google Play Store in terms of generated revenue. Both of the application shopping destinations showed some serious growth during the first half of 2018 as compared to last year.

links.title: Munro & Associates are impressed with Tesla Model 3 after tearing one apart
links.description: Shortly after the Tesla Model 3 began to trickle into the market, Munro & Associates was able to acquire an early production model of the car in order to tear it apart and analyze its construction.
